name: Dust (TwoCellStudios)
description:
On your way home from space junking, your ship runs low on fuel. Luckily, you pick up a signal for a colonized planet nearby. There should be somewhere to refuel there.

Unluckily for you, it turns out that the colony has been overtaken by sentient alien life. This would normally be bad news, but for a quick-witted space junker like you? This will be child's play. You might even find something good to sell on your mission!

In the game Dust you must survive an onslaught of enemies on this foreign planet. CONFINED to being within your OX1Drone’s range, you will have to fight for your life - and fuel!

Credit's
